'''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [location](/pillarsOfEternityIiDeadfireWorldMap/) in {{poe2}}.

## Background

Freshly built on the shores of Dunnage, Lifter's Refuge are the docks of the pirate town, littered with miscreants, ne'er-do-wells, and other riff-raff who feel right at home here. 

## Points of interest

* This is a very small dock map, with the characters standing on the shore in close proximity to each other.
* A neglected pig, [Chauncey](/chauncey/), wanders the balcony just in front of the docks.
* [Dunnage House](/dunnageHouse/), the only sub-location in the area. Can only be accessed during [The Man of Chimes](/theManOfChimes/).

##  Characters 

* [Udita](/udita/), a pale elf and bounty broker.
* [Barquami](/barquami/), a beggar.
* [Kae Polzech](/kaePolzech/) and [Carlo Fortuni](/carloFortuni/), trainers.

###### During [The Man of Chimes](/theManOfChimes/)

* [Li'l Woody](/lilWoody/), [Captain Tatzatl](/captainTatzatl/), [Giacolo](/giacolo/)
